# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly enhance your productivity and efficiency. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your routine. For this opportunity, I am proposing a special introductory price of $85. This is an exclusive offer tailored for potential early adopters like yourself. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the benefits firsthand! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer
